channel.title: Carolyn Jourdan, Heart in the Right Place, A Memoir
channel.description: Heart in the Right Place by Carolyn Jourdan, a moving and comedic memoir.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Hilarious Memoir
channel.itunes:summary: A spoiled, high-powered Washington lawyer is forced to leave her job at the Senate and come back home to the Smoky Mountains to work as an unpaid and inept receptionist in her father's tiny medical office. Comedy, pathos, hilarious ineptitude, and bad reception follow.
channel.itunes:keywords: Carolyn Jourdan, Heart in the Right Place, medical, comedy, humor, memoir, Smoky Mountains, Knoxville
channel.itunes:author: Carolyn Jourdan

item.title: Honey, I'm Home
item.itunes:author: Carolyn Jourdan
item.itunes:subtitle: When a sniper gets sniped!
item.summary: Amazing true story told to a Smoky Mountains medical receptionist.

item.title: The Post Hole Digger
item.itunes:author: Carolyn Jourdan
item.itunes:subtitle: The unexpected dangers of farming!
item.summary: Hilarious true story about a farming accident told to a Smoky Mountains medical receptionist.
